response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Sum of Digits\", \"description\": \"Write a function `sum_of_digits` that calculates the sum of digits in a given integer. The input integer can be positive, negative or zero.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A non-negative integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of digits in the input integer.\\n\", \"code\": \"def sum_of_digits(n: int) -> int:\\n    # Calculate the absolute value of the input integer\\n    n = abs(n)\\n    # Initialize a variable to store the sum of digits\\n    total_sum = 0\\n    # Iterate over each digit in the integer\\n    while n > 0:\\n        # Add the last digit to the total sum and remove it from the number\\n        total_sum += n % 10\\n        n //= 10\\n    # Return the sum of digits\\n    return total_sum\", \"tests\": [\"assert sum_of_digits(123) == 6\", \"assert sum_of_digits(-123) == 6\", \"assert sum_of_digits(0) == 0\"] }"
